name: binaris-redis-crud
description: Backend CRUD API leveraging Redis to store data.

scripts.deploy: bn deploy public_create_endpoint && bn deploy public_read_endpoint && bn deploy public_update_endpoint && bn deploy public_delete_endpoint
scripts.remove: bn remove public_create_endpoint && bn remove public_read_endpoint && bn remove public_update_endpoint && bn remove public_delete_endpoint

author: Jake Langholz
